divs: sighting details2\1\12 roseville ca 3:05pm an oval object silver\white in color at a very high altitude was traveling due north at an unbelievable speed and made no engine noises. the object had no wings or tail like a typical aircraft and had no contrail behind it. about five minutes later at around 3:10pm a large military jet about the size and shape of a b-52 traveled a similar flight path as the oval object almost as if it was attempting to follow or chase the object down. the wing outlines on the jet were clearly visible as well as the tail section. the jet also streamed contrails from both wings. the contrails from the jet remained in the sky for at least 10 minutes after it passed. the oval wingless object did not leave any contrails behind it. the oval object was traveling at least 4 to 5 times faster and appeared to be about twice the size of this large jet.
Summary: Wingless oval object traveling at high speed and high altitude produced no contrails.
trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Roseville
There were no other sightings in Roseville on or around February 1st 2012
